data.actual_result: You are still at the position of the user you searched for
data.expected_result: You should stay at the top of the user list, because technically you never scrolled down
data.short_description: Cancelling search in "Add friends to Group DM" doesn't reset scroll
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Friends list - Tap "Add friends to Group DM" - Focus user search bar - Type in letters so that the very first user showing up isn't the same as when the searchfield is empty - Clear the search textfield
